reviewText: Low to no budget movie.  Editing was bad in reference to sound and transitions.  Many plot holes not delved into or expanded upon.  Had a hard time following the storyline -if there was one, and the conclusion unrealistic.  Great movie on what not to do in all facets of movie making.

A gritty tale of an Artist's struggle against a big Record company's desire to make him fit the mold of every other rap artist out there.
Low budget but high value storytelling by Mr Petrie!
